description: Application for a minor-material amendment under S73 following a grant of planning permission Ref: P2018/2299/FUL dated 12th April 2019 for 'Enhanced landscaping incorporating multi-use hardstanding for community events, soft landscaping and additional access points with reconfigured railings'. The amendments being sought include the partial retention of the existing railings, four additional granite bollards and two relocated benches.
decision_conditions:
S73 - CONSENT LIMITED TO THAT OF ORIGINAL PERMISSION:  The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of 12 April 2022.

REASON: To ensure the commencement timescale for the development is not extended beyond that of the original planning permission granted on [12/04/2019] [LBI ref: [2018/2299/FUL].    Furthermore, to comply with the provisions of Section 91(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended by the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 (Chapter 5).
